text:
Hi Everyone, As I am going through the most recent HubSpot plugin update, I get some issue and seems like HubSpot is still not active for Full Site Editor. I am trying to console wp.blocks.getBlockTypes() on wordpress Editor screen but could not find
leadin/HubSpot-form-block and also page breaks if I try to add any block which is same old issue. Please let me know if you have any solutions.

I am having issues with seeing my extensions populate with content if I am on my VPN - if I disconnect they populate fine.  Please note I also get that notice about not being able to connect to the dev server but it doesn't seem to cause any issue, I can still see that content just fine even using from serverless functions so not sure what triggers that warning
FYI: you can use PHP with the HubSpot APIs - there is a client library <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/client-libraries>
Good point <@U01GW2U4WMA>! Didn't think of this because it feels a bit outdated :sweat_smile:

Hi, has anyone nailed the HubSpot consent banner for the external site integration via GTM?
Specifically, when the Consent Update becomes ‘granted’ by user, the initial tags wont fire for some reason. Any help is appreciated!
Hey guys! Has anyone tried to connect an outlook inbox aswell as a gmail inbox to the same user account?

Does the sample quote link below not work?
<https://19807175.HubSpotpreview-na1.com/_hcms/preview/template/multi?businessUnitId=0&domain=default&hsPreviewerApp=template&hs_preview_key=undefined&portalId=19807175&tc_deviceCategory=desktop&template_file_path=%40HubSpot%2Fcms-quotes-theme%2Ftemplates%2Foriginal.html&updated=1723056132392&|https://19807175.HubSpotpreview-na1.com/_hcms/preview/template/multi?businessUnitId=0&domain[…]me%2Ftemplates%2Foriginal.html&updated=1723056132392&>

HI Kaitlyn. No that is requiring a login. Could you create a test quote and then save/publish it. Then grab the url and paste here. Or if you contact me <https://bootstrapcreative.com/contact/> you could share your url that way.

Is it different email addresses or the same? Like the user used gmail from phone and outlook from desktop?

If this is just for the sales plugin that tracks your messages, all this does is add a bcc address to your outgoing emails. 

Technically this should work just fine

You are using gtm to add the tag to your non HubSpot website? 

So a user clicks the accept button. What initial tags are not firing?

Hard to say exactly the place to look in your folder structure but it is right here on the body. But this stylesheet is probably used on other templates in your system so to be safe you would need to override this for just the quote.

Do you know if you have a custom quote theme?

<https://cdn2.HubSpot.net/hub/19807175/hub_generated/template_assets/65272153873/1654157091389/AdVault_2021/css/custom-styles.css>

Thank you!! I don't know about the custom quote. Before I put the question in the channel, I looked across all the html and css files related to the quote templates and couldn't find anything in the files when I searched "background" or for an image.

:sparkles:Slack Tips and Best Practices:sparkles:

To get the most out the HubSpot Developer Slack, follow these best practices:

• Will your post/question potentially help more than one person? Ask in a public channel instead of 1:1 DMs to help as many folks as possible. 
• Thread all replies to keep topics organized and searchable
• Thread followup questions/comments to your original post
• Don't post the same question in multiple channels. If you must, link to your original question in new channels.
More <https://slack.com/blog/collaboration/etiquette-tips-in-slack|great tips here>. Thanks for making the HubSpot Developer Slack easier to use for everyone!

Yes. I understand. It would just be nice to be able to see them in preview mode. I guess that's a feature I could suggest. My work around was I could make another blog that is limited only to internal people, and possibly have a feed where both the public and private/internal posts are being displayed, but I'm currently not sure if that is possible.

Hi everyone. I am trying to upload a bunch of contacts and companies using the python api, but am encountering a strange behaviour where everything works fine when restricting my codes runtime by either clicking through each step or intruducing sleep times, but when i run the code normally, duplicates are created. Same code different sh*t. Only difference is how fast it is executed. Has anyone encountered something similar? Thx in advance!

As Olia noted it can be done for sections via code. Its not possible for the other dnd area items.
We know folks would like a way to do it in the editor on sections as well. We want to deliver a great experience in this area for both developers and marketers and it's unfortunately not a situation where we can say release an open text field first then move to the better system and have it still be a good experience. So just know we hear your feedback and want to deliver something better than you're used to seeing from many other platforms when it comes to this.
